root: ^Hello, would you sit with me a while? I could use the company.
^Headed to the city for a big event?
^No, I’m afraid the city is not even my end destination, just one of many stops along the way.
^Are you travelling entirely by train? That’s a long journey!
^It’s not all by train. Train, plane, boat.
^Wow, that’s a lot of travelling. Where are you going?
^I’m not really going anywhere, but also I am going everywhere.
^I’m a travelling ambassador. So I go from city, to town, from region, to county to wherever I am needed to go.
^That’s so exciting! You must meet so many people.
^I do! I do… It is all very exciting. Many places to go, many people to meet.
^May we just sit in silence for a while? I would enjoy that very much.
